member.name: M:Flight.Airplane.FlyTo(Flight.Coordinate)
member.summary: The distance from the current position to the new point

member.name: M:Flight.Airplane.GetFlyTime(Flight.Coordinate)
member.summary: Airplane flight time. The start speed is 200 km/h and it increases every 10 km by 10 km/h.

member.name: M:Flight.Bird.FlyTo(Flight.Coordinate)
member.summary: The distance from the current position to the new point

member.name: M:Flight.Bird.GetFlyTime(Flight.Coordinate)
member.summary: Bird flight time. This is the distanse divided by the speed. Bird speed may be between 0-20 Ðºm/h. Speed is randomly selected.

member.name: M:Flight.Drone.FlyTo(Flight.Coordinate)
member.summary: The distance from the current position to the new point.

member.name: M:Flight.Drone.GetFlyTime(Flight.Coordinate)
member.summary: Drone flight time. The drone speed 100 km/h. The drone hovers in the air every 10 minutes of flight for 1 minute.
